creator: jfan@ohpp.com
text:
2001-02-21 01:59:25 - Ctx( /pr ): IOException in: R( /pr + /images/divider.gif +
 null) socket write error (code=10053)
*** Bug 846 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: nacho@apache.org
nacho@apache.org
text:
This is not really a bug, it's more of a IE glitch in the handling of 
connections for a HTTP/1.0 server, IE kills the connection when he sees the 
header....

creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text:
As described below, this really isn't a bug.  This won't be addressed in 
3.2.2.  I'll leave the bug report open so that maybe a later release can adjust 
the output so that it doesn't look so bad.
